thread.title: George Clooney scolded by Matt Damon for sharing pregnancy news just weeks after discovering they were expecting
thread.title_full: George Clooney scolded by Matt Damon for sharing pregnancy news just weeks after discovering they were expecting

author: Natalie Evans
title: George Clooney scolded by Matt Damon for sharing pregnancy news just weeks after discovering they were expecting
text:
Celebs George Clooney scolded by Matt Damon for sharing pregnancy news just weeks after discovering they were expecting Actor Matt revealed he told George off for letting slip he was going to be a dad before Amal had reached her 'safe' second trimester Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Pregnant Amal and George just days before 'twins announcement' Share this video Get celebs   
George Clooney couldn't wait to share the news of wife Amal's pregnancy , telling close pal Matt Damon just weeks after they found out, it emerged last night. 
Actor Matt "almost started crying" when he found out the happy news last year. 
But he revealed he scolded his friend George for revealing the secret before Amal had entered her second trimester. 
Human rights lawyer Amal , 39, is due to give birth to twins in June. Read More George Clooney's wife Amal pregnant with twins and 'expecting a boy and a girl' George Clooney and Amal are believed to be expecting twins in June (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
'Great Wall' star Matt admitted George, 55, told him he was going to be a dad when Amal was just eight weeks into her pregnancy. 
The Oscar winner told 'Entertainment Tonight Canada': "I was working with him last fall and he pulled me aside on set and I mean, I almost started crying. I was so happy for him. 
"And I was like, 'How far along is she?' And he goes, 'Eight weeks.'" George confided in close pal Matt just weeks after finding out the happy news (Photo: WireImage) 
Matt, who has four daughters with wife Luciana Barroso, rapped George on the knuckles for telling him the news before Amal had entered her second trimester. 
He said: "(I said) 'Are you out of your mind?! Don't tell anybody else! Don't tell anybody else! Don't you know the 12-week rule?' Like of course he doesn't. 'Just shut up, man.' Read More Matt Damon (left) and George Clooney in Columbia Pictures' THE MONUMENTS MEN. (Photo: Twentieth Century Fox) 
"And then four weeks later, I'm like, 'We're good right?' (George confirmed) 'We're good.'" 
The 46-year-old star thinks George is very lucky to have found Amal and predicts they'll be great parents. Amal's apparent bump sparked pregnancy rumours (Photo: Getty) 
He added: "So yeah, I'm thrilled for him. She's amazing. He hit the jackpot. Just on every level. 
"She is a remarkable woman. They're gonna be great. They're gonna be awesome parents. Those kids are lucky." 
The couple have yet to officially comment on the news, but confirmed the rumours they're expecting twins - believed to be a boy and a girl - through multiple friends. Like us on Facebook
